email.subject: Scheduled Report
email.body_template:
Dear $!firstName,

Your scheduled $!reportTitle is ready for viewing.

If the above link does not work, log onto the voting site and paste http://www.overseasvotefoundation.org/vote/reportingdashboard/ViewReport.htm?reportId=$!reportId&startDate=$!startDate&endDate=$!endDate into your browser.

Contact us at voterhelpdesk@overseasvotefoundation.org anytime with questions or comments.
